Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

I think the council usurped power for 
the restart decision which should belong 
to the playeres.  Also I think so many 
new players are here that neither 
restart nor sequel is required.  We 
should just put all the inactive chars 
in a magnetic field until the owners 
return.  Do you agree? 

  o yes, the council usurped power 
  o no, the council still usurped power 
  o yes, but the council did not usurp power 
  o no, the council did not usurp power 
  o what does usurp mean? 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
